summary: The script loads scenario simulation results, extracts cause‑specific mortality and disability (DALY) counts by period, sex, age group and wealth, aligns them with Global Burden of Disease reference data, and produces comparative tables and stacked bar visualisations to assess how closely the model matches external estimates.
business_intent: To validate and calibrate the health model by quantifying discrepancies between simulated cause‑of‑death and disability outcomes and GBD benchmarks, enabling model refinement and confidence in policy analyses.
